valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 2 Jan 2026 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 3 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low southern Sweden 972 expected gotland 977 by midnight tonight. Low 150 miles east of Azores 987 expected Trafalgar with little change by same time
